name: Bird Match-3 - Flappy Blitz Puzzle Game FREE
name_original: Bird Match-3 - Flappy Blitz Puzzle Game FREE
description:
********* Free Bird Match-3 Game! **********

********* Fun Birdy-Busting Action **********

Treat yourself to the most exhilarating match-3 game experience that has come to the App Store.

Match and detonate as many flapping birds as you can in 60 action-packed seconds. Switch and match 3 or more of them to create cascades of fun and solve various levels in this compelling puzzle adventure. Rack up as many points as you can in a minute blitz. This is a fast-paced game that is sure to get you addicted. Brace yourself for challenging stages as you level up.

With waves of excitement in every slide, expect a thrilling match-3 experience that will keep you hooked for a long time!

Features:

* Puzzles that develop logic and faster thinking
* Stunning graphics
* Color-rich gameplay
* Multiple power-ups to unlock
* Fun for all ages

Send your score soaring!

Download FREE Today!
